alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Floyd; Grayson (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 08 at 4:31AM EST until January 09 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 10 AM EST TUESDAY... * WHAT...A period of sleet and freezing rain is expected. Sleet accumulation is expected to be less than an inch. Icing from freezing rain may accumulate up to one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...Portions of northwest North Carolina and southwest Virginia especially along the Blue Ridge Parkway where low temperatures will be near freezing. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 10 AM EST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...In addition to the potential icing, wind gusts of 40 to 50 mph are possible at the highest elevations. Rain will also become heavy at times.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
